trackTitle: JavaScript from Basic to Ultra Expert
description: A complete JavaScript learning path from absolute beginner to ultra expert, designed for classroom and self-paced learners. Includes exercises, mini-projects, assessments, and career-focused skills.

institute.name: Coder & AccoTax
institute.author: Sukanta Hui
institute.location: 25(10/A) Shibtala Road, PO – N. C. Pukur, Barrackpore, West Bengal, India

segments.title: Segment 1 – Core Foundations (Beginner)
segments.summary: Start from zero and build a rock-solid foundation in JavaScript, syntax, data types, and basic problem solving.
